response.job_title: Software Backend Developer 💻 | Java ☕ | Node.js | AWS | Always ready for new challenges 🚀
response.summary:
Software Backend Developer with 6 years of experience in software development and maintenance using language such as Java, Node.js, AEM, SQL databases, web services and other technologies which allows me to have experience with the complete software development life cycle.

I consider myself an ambitious and motivated person, eager to expand my knowledge and skills to keep up with the latest technologies and trends. I am able to adapt quickly to new environments with a positive attitude with a commitment to deliver high quality work.

If you are interested in my profile I invite you to contact me through linkedin or the following channels Tel: +57 300 466 75 20 or Email: andresmaomorales@gmail.com.
response.skills: Groovy, Terraform, Amazon Simple Queue Service (SQS), Amazon S3, Amazon DynamoDB, SQL, Java, Java EE, AEM, MySQL, Node.js, Microsoft SQL Server, Adobe Experience Manager, MongoDB, Microsoft Azure, PlS, Google Cloud, Slack, JIRA, Go

• I achieved promotion due to my good performance in the team, implementing different tools to follow up the team and helping to improve the products as a developer.

• Improve the queries performed by the different applications avoiding errors in production and improving times by 90% by using sub-series and creating new support tables.

profile_positions.title: Junior Software Engineer

school.name: Universidad Distrital Francisco José de Caldas

company.name: FPT Latin America
company.description:
FPT Latin America was formed after the merger of Intertec International and FPT Software in 2023. 

FPT Latin America is a part of FPT Corporation, a globally leading technology and IT services & solutions provider headquartered in Vietnam, with nearly US$1.6 billion in revenue and 41,000 employees in 29 countries. 

With offices in Costa Rica, Colombia, and Mexico, FPT Latin America has team members across the Latin American region. 

As a pioneer in digital transformation, it delivers world-class services in Smart factories, Digital platforms, RPA, AI, IoT, Enterprise Mobility, Digital Product Development, Cloud, AR/VR, Business Applications, Application Services, Managed Services, and so on. The company has served 1,000+ customers worldwide, 85 of which are Fortune Global 500 companies in the industries of Aerospace & Aviation, Manufacturing & Automotive, Banking, Finance & Insurance, Logistics & Transportation, Healthcare & Life Sciences, Retail, Utilities & Energy, and more.
